price: Na mtaje Maryamu katika Kitabu, pale alipo jitenga na jamaa zake mahali upande wa mashariki.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَانٗا شَرۡقِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyan
